section.class: s_title parallax s_parallax_is_fixed bg-black-50 pt24 pb24

div.p: Contact us about if you want more information on us or our tours. Also, for private tours or group bookings, please contact us via this form.

span.class: s_cta_badge o_cc d-inline-block my-3 border rounded py-2 px-3 o_animable o_cc5 o_colored_level

div.span: AVAILABLE FOR PRIVATE BOOKINGS    Contact us
div.h1: Explore the Depths of the Ocean with Adam Diver.
div.p: Experience the thrill of weightlessness as you glide through the underwater realm, where each movement feels like a dance. Encounter vibrant fish and stunning coral formations that create a mesmerizing underwater landscape. Whether you wish to simply explore the depths or become a PADI certified diver, we at Scuba Tours have got you covered!

section.class: s_numbers o_colored_level o_cc o_cc1 pt24 pb16

div.p: Explore the depths with a package that suits you

div.class: s_pricelist_cafe_col col-lg-4 py-5 o_cc o_cc5 s_col_no_resize o_colored_level

span.class: s_pricelist_cafe_item_description d-block mt-2 pe-5 text-muted o_small

li.span:
No prior experience required!
Every Monday, Wednesday and Friday at 10 a.m.
Duration 5 Hours

span.class: s_pricelist_cafe_item_description d-block mt-2 pe-5 text-muted o_small
s_pricelist_cafe_item_description d-block mt-2 pe-5 text-muted o_small

li.span:
Enjoy a private diving tour tailored to your specific needs. Our come with your own group.
Please use our contact form for a tailored quotation!

section.class: s_events s_event_upcoming_snippet s_event_event_picture s_dynamic s_dynamic_empty o_colored_level pt96 pb112 o_dynamic_snippet_empty
s_dynamic_snippet_title oe_unremovable oe_unmovable d-flex flex-column flex-md-row justify-content-between mb-lg-0 pb-md-0 o_colored_level pb56

p.strong:
We kick off our courses on the first Monday of every month, providing you with all the knowledge needed to dive into the vast ocean. 
The courses span from Monday to Friday and include insurance, equipment rental, and exam fees.

section.class: s_dynamic_snippet_content oe_unremovable oe_unmovable o_not_editable col o_colored_level

div.p: Here are some common questions about our courses.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none collapsed

div.p: All our courses are from Monday to Friday. Each day we start at our diving school at 10 a.m. and finish at 1:30 p.m.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none collapsed

div.p: You are ensured through DAN during the entirety of the course. All dives, equipment and emergencies are included. Please find more information on the exact coverage  here.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none collapsed

div.p: Any cancellations up to 7 days in advance of the course are fully refunded. After that, we cannot offer any refund.
